hero.title: Hi, I'm Paul –
hero.subtitle: Software Developer & Programmer
hero.description: Bodybuilder, crypto enthusiast, and aspiring successful computer scientist.
hero.slogan: Programming is art – and code is my canvas.

crateflow.title: Crateflow
crateflow.description: My work at Crateflow focuses on developing frontend and backend functionalities. A particular focus was on the user interface, enabling users to efficiently visualize their data. The project includes modern technologies like React, TypeScript, and Docker.

cs50.title: Harvard CS50 Courses
cs50.description: I have completed several courses in Harvard's renowned CS50 series, including CS50x, CS50Python, CS50Web, and CS50Cybersecurity. These courses have significantly enhanced my skills in programming, web development, and cybersecurity. I did not complete final projects in the last two courses because I started working on Crateflow in parallel.

clients.title: Client Websites
clients.description: I create professional and appealing websites for clients using WordPress and Webflow. Through customized designs and efficient development processes, I ensure that each website not only looks impressive but is also functional and user-friendly. My service includes complete website development, from conception and design to implementation and maintenance.

experience.title: Intern
description: Compiled media overviews for regional newspapers to support political decision-making.
Designed engaging social media content to strengthen political presence.

experience.title: Trainee
description: Developed and maintained backend applications using Django.
Created interactive frontend components with React.
Improved system performance through optimization of database queries and API endpoints.

github.title: My GitHub
github.description: Here is a small insight into my repositories on GitHub.

django_first_app.title: How I Built My First Django App
django_first_app.description: A brief insight into my development process, challenges, and how I solved them.

ai_python.title: Artificial Intelligence: How to Set Up a Simple AI Model in Python
ai_python.description: An introduction to machine learning and AI – ideal for beginners who want to embark on their first experiments.
